settings.title: How much does the mirror cost?
settings.text:
- Mirror: $999 plus tax based on your delivery zip code, if applicable
- Delivery & Installation: $250
- Circolo Membership: $19/mo for unlimited family member profiles

settings.title: Do I need a Membership and what does Membership include?
settings.text: An active Circolo Membership is necessary to access any and all of our classes. Your $19/month Membership provides access to unlimited on-demand lessons and virtual workout group with friends for you and your household members. You each get your own login so you can personalize your Circolo experience and track your progress!

settings.title: Does Circolo have an app?
settings.text: Yes, with Circolo Mobile App you can access our entire library of on demand classes via your phone or tablet. You can also import additional Youtube videos to your workout program via the mobile app.

settings.title: If I order today, when will my Mirror be delivered and installed?
settings.text:
Orders placed today will be delivered & installed on average within 7 business days (although some orders may be delivered sooner).  Within 1-3 business days, our Delivery Team will contact you via phone or email to schedule delivery.

During delivery, our Delivery Team will install on Stand and set up internet connection. This service typically takes 30-45 minutes.

settings.title: How do I schedule delivery?
settings.text:
After your MIrror purchase, our Delivery Team will contact you via phone or email within 1-3 business days to schedule delivery.

Your Mirror should get delivered & installed on average within 7 business days (although some orders may be delivered sooner).

settings.title: What are the operating requirements for The Mirror and how much space do I need?
settings.text:
The Mirror is 56” H, 22.4” W, 1.7” D, weighs 70 lbs, and blends seamlessly into any home environment.

You need a standard outlet and access to WiFi to operate your Mirror. Your Mirror comes with a 6’ power cord. If your outlet is farther away from the Mirror, you may use an extension cord or any C13 power cord.

settings.title: Does The Mirror requires WiFi?
settings.text:
The Mirror requires a WiFi connection that can provide at least 10 Mbps of stable speed for live streaming classes.

If you are concerned about your WiFi speed, you can perform a speed test by following these instructions:

Connect your phone to the same WiFi network as the Mirror, and stand directly in front of the Mirror. Visit https://fast.com/ After the test completes (this may take a few seconds), tap on "Show more info"

Note: WiFi speed may vary across devices.

settings.title: What is the return policy?
settings.text: With our Risk-Free Trial, returns are free and easy! We know you will love your Mirror but if you are not 100% satisfied, you can return it for a full refund within 30 days of delivery. Note, if you choose to delay your Mirror delivery, your Risk-Free Trial will not begin until you receive your Mirror. You can see our full return policy here.

settings.title: Does The Mirror come with a warranty?
settings.text: Your Mirror purchase comes with a one-year Standard Warranty.

settings.title: How do I gift the Mirror to someone at a different delivery address?
settings.text: At checkout, please provide your giftee’s delivery address and phone number. Our Delivery Team will contact directly with them to schedule delivery.

settings.title: How do I return a gift?
settings.text: We know your gift recipient will love The Mirror, but if they are not 100% satisfied, they can return it for a full refund within thirty (30) days of delivery.

settings.title: DIDN'T FIND WHAT YOU WERE LOOKING FOR?
